item.title: THM | Advent Of Cyber 4
item.description: Room Advent Of Cyber 4 Day 1 | Someone’s coming to town! Who is the adversary that attacked Santa’s network this year? The Bandit Yeti What’s the flag that they left behind? THM{IT'S A Y3T1 CHR1$TMA$} Looking to learn more? Check out the rooms on Unified Kill Chain, Cyber Kill Chain, MITRE, or the whole Cyber Defence Frameworks module! No answer needed Day 2 | Santa’s Naughty & Nice Log Ensure you are connected to the deployable machine in this task.
